articles.title: LIVE NRL: Veteran No.9 turns back the clock as Dragons snatch lead in local derby
articles.description: LIVE NRL: Veteran No.9 turns back the clock as Dragons snatch lead in local derby
articles.content:
The Dragons have shot out to an 18-6 lead over the Dragons in the local derby after scoring three consecutive tries.
The Sharks were first on the board via Braydon Trindalll, who was set up by a dangerous run out of dummy-half from Blayke Brailey.

articles.title: Video: Nasa's Punch shows huge solar eruption streaming out from the Sun
articles.description: Punch’s new images reveal huge solar eruptions, known as coronal mass ejections or CMEs, streaming out from the Sun.
articles.content: Scientists have released the first striking images from Nasa’s Punch (Polarimeter to Unify the Corona and Heliosphere) mission, which launched in March 2025 to change our understanding of the Sun’s outer atmosphere and its impact on the solar system.... [1865 chars]

articles.title: Australia vs South Africa LIVE: DRS saves Bavuma as Aussie bowlers denied early on day two
articles.description: Australia takes on South Africa for the World Test Championship of cricket at Lords with day two beginning at 7.30pm AEST. The match will be broadcast on Amazon Prime. Follow live news, scores, updates and results.
articles.content:
Temba Bavuma cracked a Pat Cummins short ball into the Grand Stand for the first six of this match.
Two balls later, he was beaten by a full delivery that moved nicely away.
This is a very different Lord’s surface to 2023, when bouncers caused proble... [280 chars]

articles.title: LIVE: Watch the Fujifilm X-Summit Shanghai 2025 as X-E5 camera announced
articles.description: Fujifilm's second X-Summit of 2025 is coming live from China
articles.content:
Refresh
Now for pricing:
The X-E5 will cost €1,549 for the body and will come in silver or black.

articles.description: The U.K. economy shrank sharply in April as global trade tariffs and domestic tax rises kicked in, data showed Thursday.

articles.title: Webb Telescope Photographs ‘Strange’ Cold Planet Around Nearby Star
articles.description: NASA’s Webb has imaged 14 Herculis c, a cold exoplanet in a misaligned system, shedding light on its orbit, temperature and atmospheric dynamics.
articles.content:
Topline
NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has captured the first direct image of an exoplanet — a planet orbiting a star other than the sun — despite it being extremely cold. The planet, called 14 Herculis c, could give scientists a new perspective o... [3755 chars]

articles.title: Jacob Greber to replace Laura Tingle as 7.30 political editor, ABC announces
articles.description: The chief digital political correspondent will replace Laura Tingle at the public broadcaster's nightly current affairs flagship.
articles.content:
Award-winning journalist Jacob Greber will join 7.30 as political editor, the ABC has announced.
Greber takes over from Laura Tingle, who stepped down from the role last month to become the public broadcaster's global affairs editor.
